author: Th3_3m3rald_M1n3cart
title: A pretty solid Minecraft Polybag
review:
LEGO Minecraft had always been a kind of expensive theme, but then they started making cheap sets and polybags. And this is one of the better polybags in my opinion.

Minifigures

The one minifigure included here is Alex. Alex first appeared in 2015 and since then either her or Steve have appeared in almost every set. But it is nice to get her in a cheap set.

The Turtle first appeared in 2019 in 21152 Pirate Ship. The build is very well-designed and captures the in-game accuracy well. The printing for the head is also nice.

The Build

The main build is relatively small, but still charming. We've got some turtle eggs that feature some nice printing, and a nice archway with a suggestion of carpeting on top. The small rose to the side is also nice.

Final Verdict

Overall, this is a good polybag that has a decent amount to offer in a small set at a low price-point. 8/10
